SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit. Originally an eight character string

UPC.description: Universal Product Code. A twelve digit barcode

ITMNAME.description: Item Name, a 50 character name of the item

DESCRIPTION.description: A longer description of the item, up to 255 characters

VELOCITY.description: A calculated field representing the consumption velocity of the item.

FIRSTAVAILABLE.description: The date the item was added to the item list

DELISTED.description: The date the item was delisted as an active item

DG.description: Indicates if the item is classified as a durable good

SNAPYES.description: Indicates if the item is eligible for SNAP benefits
